oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hikayat Nabi Allah Yusuf : manuscript, 1836
Story of the Prophet Joseph
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: American Board of Commissioners for Foreign Missions (former owner.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Microforms, Lamont Library, Harvard University Harvard Law School Library, Harvard University Harvard Law School Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Harvard Law School Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 13 lines per page, in black, red, and green. First two pages framed within triple black, red and green lines and have only 10 lines per page.
According to the colophon (ff. 144-5), copy completed on Wednesday 27 Syaaban 1252 AH [December 7, 1836 AD].
MS Indo 11. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Malay in the Jawi-Arabic script.
